name: awps-tunnel-bundle
description: A server tunnel to connect Azure Web PubSub and your local server

scripts.bootstrap: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.start: npm run server && npm run client
scripts.publish:quick-try: cross-env PUBLIC_URL=. npm --prefix client run build:manual && cmd /C "robocopy client\build ..\..\website\static\quick-try /MIR & if %25ERRORLEVEL%25 LSS 8 exit /B 0"

author: Microsoft
